mapper.select: SELECT Q.quest_id, Q.title, Q.content, Q.start_date, Q.end_date, MQ.status, MQ.finished_at FROM QUEST Q LEFT JOIN MEMBER_QUEST MQ ON Q.quest_id = MQ.quest_id AND MQ.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT quest_id FROM QUEST WHERE quest_id = #{questId}
SELECT member_id, quest_id, status, finished_at FROM MEMBER_QUEST WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND quest_id = #{questId}
